azurerm_template_deployment.description: Manages a template deployment of resources.

name.description: Specifies the name of the template deployment. Changing this forces a

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to

deployment_mode.description: Specifies the mode that is used to deploy resources. This value could be either `Incremental` or `Complete`.

template_body.description: Specifies the JSON definition for the template.

parameters.description: Specifies the name and value pairs that define the deployment parameters for the template.

parameters_body.description: Specifies a valid Azure JSON parameters file that define the deployment parameters. It can contain KeyVault references

outputs.description: A map of supported scalar output types returned from the deployment (currently, Azure Template Deployment outputs of type String, Int and Bool are supported, and are converted to strings

create.description: Used when creating the Template Deployment.

update.description: Used when updating the Template Deployment.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Template Deployment.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Template Deployment.
